lemma sc_completion_shift: assumes sc_c: "sc_completion s vs" and \<tau>Red: "s -\<triangleright>ttas\<rightarrow>* s'" and sc: "ta_seq_consist P vs (lconcat (lmap (\<lambda>(t, ta). llist_of \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub>) (llist_of ttas)))" shows "sc_completion s' (mrw_values P vs (concat (map (\<lambda>(t, ta). \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub>) ttas)))"
